inbound.text: What kind of philosophical bullshit is that? They drop money because they were defeated. That's like asking where the money in pots comes from.

Well, duh. What kind of magic weapon relies on mundane sharpness? Especially a weapon that's so obviously also an arcane focus. We're not noobs, you know.
Well, I'm not, at least.
Obviously. Only a total amateur wouldn't recognize that that's primarily an arcane focus, and the use as a conventional weapon is secondary. Do I look like an idiot to you?
So you've got a blue color scheme, you're radiating magic, and your name's Aqua. Is there any way you could signal any harder that you're a water mage?
Blue color scheme, obviously magic, and named Aqua. If there's a "water mage" bingo card, I'm pretty sure that's an immediate win.
I'm usually a big fan of lore, but all that shit about "darkness" and "hearts" and "keys" is too much even for me. How do you keep on top of it all?
Listen, I like lore as much as the next protagonist, but all that shit about "heartless" and "kingdom hearts" and "darkness" is just too much. How do you keep on top of all of it?
You know, I've been trying to get a keyblade of my own, but apparently being the Slayer doesn't inherently qualify me to use one, which sounds like bullshit to me.
I've actually been trying to get a keyblade of my own for a while, but apparently being the Slayer isn't enough to qualify me as a keyblade wielder. It's pretty bullshit.
...What? But... you wear blue clothes. And you've got blue hair. And your name means water! Why would you specialize in fire!?
Wait, but... your clothes are blue. And your hair is blue. And your name means water! What kind of self-respecting pyromancer would do something like that!?

See, this is the shit that I don't get. Seven lights, thirteen darknesses, heartless are made from hearts and the things without hearts are called nobodies... It just feels like someone was making this shit up as they went along.

Yeah, that all went in one ear and out the other. Like, X-blade? That sounds like a team of evil roller skaters. And I get there being seven lights, but why thirteen darknesses? This shit feels like someone was just making it up as they went along.
Well, yeah, but I still want a badass magic key sword. What's the point of cool secret weapons if I, as a protagonist, can't get one? There's gotta be an exception somewhere.

Well, I think those rules are dumb, because I want a badass magic key sword. Couldn't some studentless master bequeath one to me on their deathbed or something? There's gotta be a protagonist exception somewhere.
Oh shit! That's a real-ass goddamn keyblade! Nice!
Oh fuck! That's a genuine keyblade! Nice!
You don't have to try to impress anyone by acting sexy, you know. Not that you don't look good like this. You look great. But you don't have to do anything that makes you uncomfortable.
Not that I don't think this is a good look on you, but should know that you don't have to try to impress us or anything. You being comfortable is more important than showing off for us.
So it's magic... That explains that. It definitely doesn't look sharp, but I'll take your word for it.
It's a good thing I've already been to a world with magic, or I'd definitely say that key looks anything but sharp.
I think we've had similar experiences, Aqua. Been to different worlds, but they've all got their own breed of trouble.
So you've traveled between worlds too, right? Then we both know that nowhere is free of conflict.
So you can just summon that to your hand whenever you feel like it? That seems pretty handy.
I'm not sure how I'm supposed to react, but... think you can teach me how to summon a weapon like that?
â€‹If they really somehow get confused by us having similar names, they might need glasses.
What dumbass wouldn't be able to see the difference between us?
Yo! Aqua! I want to ask you something. Are you called Aqua because you belong to an organization? Or is it just the name your parents gave you?
Well, I think it suits you. Your hair color is beautiful if I say so myself.
Hello, everyone. Nice to meet you. I'm... Aqua?
... What have I walked in on?
Nice to meet you! Please, call me... Aqua? Is that another... me?
Nice to meet you! Please, call me... Aqua? What's going on, why are there two more copies of... me?
With so many copies of... me... things are going to get confusing, aren't they?
Do I really look like that?
This is a unique chance to see what I look like from an outsider's perspective. It's even better than having a mirror!
Does this have anything to do with the Power of Waking? I hope not... I'd rather not be exiled from reality...
This is your lucky day, ~player~. Getting to hang out with more than one version of me...
I think we all feel a strong bond with you, ~player~. Must be the Wayfinder.
... So we all want to jump ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ bones, right? Or am I the only `me' thinking it?
I was about to say. I feel a strong bond with you, ~player~...
Thank you, Aqua. You're pretty good looking yourself.
I never thought I'd get to say this, but... I look rather sexy from this angle.
This has to be some kind of joke... You're telling me all three of us are called Aqua? How ridiculous...
Huh? You're called Aqua too? Seriously?
Hey, not that I don't appreciate the flattery and all, but you really shouldn't go around impersonating a goddess. Plus, you kinda got my outfit all wrong.
If it's so confusing to you, why not call me Lady Aqua? I'd say it's a perfectly fitting name!
Hey hey, what can that Keyblade thingy do exactly? Is it just some kind of weird shaped sword or does it have some extra powers?
So then, if you're not just a copycat, what exactly is your deal, Aqua?
Keyblade, huh? Interesting...
My... That's an interesting looking weapon...
Well, if the name Darkness is too confusing to you, you could call her Lalatina!
Nicknames, eh? Well, I can call you Aqua just fine, and you should call me Lady Aqua! Considering I'm a goddess, I believe that's the most logical solution.
Oh, is that so? I see... I never would've thought I'd find another person named Aqua here. Much less one that is so blue...
How dare you?! I am most definitely not a goddess of lust! I'm the goddess of water! Was my name not enough of a giveaway??
Absolutely not!! I am the goddess of water!! I have never been a goddess of any kind of lust!
How insolent! I am not a goddess of lust! I simply find it more comfortable to not wear such things!
I see, so that's one of the reasons why people come here... You want to get naked with strangers.
Fighting, huh... Alright, I won't press you for details on that. I suppose you could say I'm here for similar reasons considering all of the questing I've done with my party.

Tremendous power against creatures of darkness? Well well, now you've definitely got my attention! Would you be interested in joining my party for a quest or two? You'd get the chance to go on a quest with a real goddess!
Any seal or lock? Really now... Actually... Would that Keyblade work on a barrier too?
My name being Aqua has no relation to this whatsoever. I simply chose to not wear anything out of comfort.
For your information, wearing no underwear is simply more comfortable! You humans are so hung up on embarrassment that you just can't realize that.

So you'd say that "keyblade" is more of a magic channeler or a booster? I've managed to learn magic without needing one of those, but using gadgets like that does seem to be a common thing with the people at Primp.
Well Aqua, it just so happens that one-on-one battles are my specialty! May the best sorcerer win!
Pressure? None at all! May the best sorcerer win!
The name does not sound familiar, Aqua. However, we do have a little park in Primp town where we can practice friendly Puyo duels.
You may be running a flawless game so far, but so have I, May the best sorcerer win!
You may be running a flawless game so far, but I won't get discouraged by that! May the best sorcerer win!
As long as you are not using that "keyblade" to give yourself an unfair advantage. You shouldn't count me out! May the best sorcerer win!
You'd be correct! Several years in magic school plus a ton of actual battles, but one never stops learning. Wouldn't you agree?
I take it you are also some sort of sorcerer since you are asking, Aqua?
I think I heard you mention something about being able to travel to many different worlds, Aqua?
So, you mentioned something about gliders earlier, Aqua. Would you happen to have an extra one? Traveling worlds for me and my friends usually ends with us falling from the sky out of control.
So I take it you've learnt how to travel between worlds with full control. That kind of magic would be really useful for me and my friends...
Huh, I don't know anything about tra~ver~sing lanes... But I bet that you guide me, I could probably learn a way to control that kind of magic too!

It's fine. Though it would be nice to have something to break the fall. I can't stop thinking that the temporal memory loss we get sometimes from that may have something to do with hitting our heads on the way down.
Well, thank you kindly for the compliment! I actually know a guy myself who fights with a key too!
That weapon... The magic behind it is unlike anything I've ever seen. From where, exactly, do you draw your strength?
My interest is piqued... I've never encountered a form of magic like that key. Where does this power emerge from?
A world traveler, are you? I've been to other worlds myself, but it seems like you're some sort of universal peacekeeper.
I've traveled to other worlds myself, but not to your extent. What's more, it seems your role is some kind of galactic peacekeeper...
...You're an odd one, you know that? You've got such an incredible body, but it's like you're totally unaware of it.
...Honestly, I'm not sure if you're just humble or oblivious. If I were born with a body like yours, I'd be flaunting it at every opportunity.
It's fine. (I'll be safe, at least...)
Your outfit's got a lot of belts... Straps... ribbons. It's pretty cute, but functional too, right?
We're both here to meet people we don't already know really well, right?
So, it's a weapon, that key of yours... Why's it shaped like a key? If it were a knife, or... I guess, it's got to be some kind of symbol, right?
I prefer pockets, but I guess if you've gotta carry around a bunch of stuff... it makes sense.
It's kind of weird to think that I'm more experienced than you, considering how pretty you are.
Like... what? (It still seems like you could maim a monster with it.)
I know a survivor when I see one. Regardless of what you're surviving.
Whoa--! H-hey, give some warning before you pull out a magic weapon--!
Hey, Aqua!
I've always had some magical abilities, but I was taught how to use them by Dark Magician! I learned just about everything I know from him!
And you? Someone must have shown you how to use that big sword of yours!
What about you? You look like you know how to fight, and I bet you had someone to teach you.
I sure can! It's a neat little trick, but it sounds like it's a lot more useful on your armor! It means you don't have to carry all that weight around with you between battles, right?
Oh... You brought a weapon? I'm not scared, but maybe I shouldn't have left my magic staff at home.
It's a nice sword, but I don't think you need it here. It's not like there's going to be any kind of trouble here.
You should see me when I'm actually in a fight! That's really when I put my Dark Magic to use! On top of that, the reason I can control Dark Magic so well is because I'm so un-dark!
So what you'r saying is, this is not the only world where many people can meet? I didn't get the memo.
As I mentioned before, I am a peerless swordsman. That alone is enough. Besides, my role is usually one that draws attention from foes, and I can do that just fine.
In terms of swordsmanship, I'm without match. Aside from that, my role is usually that of drawing the attention of our foes. I can do that just fine.
Ah? You may be confusing it for my old weapon, Aqua. Yes, this one is relatively down-to-ground.
Not exactly, Aqua. I had to take a year-long rest after the battle of Sword Valley, and again when I tried to grab the Monado again...
Not quite, Aqua. I had to take a year of downtime after the battle of Sword Valley. It did take quite a toll on me.
Indeed, Aqua. Relentless mechanical foes from the Mechonis. Ordinary blades were useless. Only ether attacks and advanced weaponry could even scratch them.
Something like that. I would need an anti-Mechon glaive to deal with my mechanical foes, but, I didn't see fit to bring one with me.
I made sure the rest of my body was in top shape. Didn't want my stamina to suffer, after all.
Of course. I didn't want my stamina to suffer just because of this old injury. I kept on top of things.
The Mechon. Relentless mechanical foes from the Mechonis. Ordinary weapons couldn't damage them. Only ether attacks and advanced weaponry could even scratch them.
If by `magic', you're referring to ether, then I have no need of it. I am unmatched in swordplay, and that is enough.
Doing alright there, Aqua? Or are you letting your imagination wander?
Are you alright, Aqua? Or is your imagination running wild?
Doing alright there, Aqua? Or... is your imagination running wild? My stamina could come in useful in the bedroom, after all.
Are you alright, Aqua? Or is your imagination running wild? Thinking about how good my stamina could be in the bedroom?
Well, it's certainly a good look for you. I think you pull it off, Aqua.
Have you been traveling alone, Aqua? You seem the sort to keep good company.
I get the sense I struck a nerve, my apologies. Still, you seem to be a capable young lass. And, from the sound of things, an adept fighter?
So, the Keyblade... I've never seen nor heard of one before to~background.time~, but so far I'm impressed.
So, this is your Keyblade... I've never laid eyes on one before, nor had I even heard of one before meeting you. Astounding!
I'm not the only one here. Look at ~player~, Aqua. I know you want to. ~player.ifMale(He's|She's)~ worthy of your gaze.
Does it feel good to touch your own breasts? How about your nipples? They look perfect from here. Soft, yet enticing...
Oh, I cannot help but compliment your legs, of course. Your legs are gorgeous. Beautiful as they are, I'd love to kiss my way up them. What do you think?
What sort of foreplay would get you going, Aqua? If you aren't even sure of what you want, then you should certainly take your time to let your partner explore all avenues.
Don't discount your fingers, Aqua. Your fingers are a good way to get your body used to larger penetrations, after all. Plus, you can work yourself into a frenzy before the main act.
What do you think, Aqua? A key, a lock, the two joining together? I'm sure you've heard that one before.
You don't need to hold back, Aqua. Let it build until you feel it unleash.
Aqua. If you have any doubts, let me put your mind at ease. You look sexy as hell right now, being so pleased by your own fingers.
Need advice? Gently tease around your entrance, Aqua. You can get a lot of intense pleasure from that.
What do you want to be done to you, Aqua? Say your mind. Don't be ashamed to have these thoughts.
Trust me, Aqua. I know what I'm doing. I've got enough experience that I could take the lead, if you liked.
A partner with little experience isn't a bad thing. It just means you haven't learned any tricks, good or bad. So I could show you what to do.
Sick outfit, Aqua! I could never rock corsets, even back in high school... Way too tight, you get me?
Sweet outfit! I could never get corsets to look right, they're just so tight, you know? But you rock it!
Fighting "the darkness" sounds like a pretty heavy task... Do you do anything to wind down?
Weird thing for me to say, but you seem like you'd like a Tamagotchi. You know, one of those little keychain pets? I think it'd fit you.
I'll probably sound weird saying this, but you seem like you'd like a Tamagotchi. One of those keychain pets, you know? Don't know why, but I think it'd fit you...
I-I mean, it's cool and all... But I don't do well with weapons. You understand, right?
I've come from the land of Oz, more specifically I am in the Western territory of the Vinkus country.
If you know Oz, I fraternize with the Western country of Vinkus there. It is very... homely, you know?
Oh, is that what you're going to..? No?
Hmm... Very interesting, indeed.
That was... incredible. How were you able to do that, Aqua? A natural talent or the doing of spells?
I'm impressed. How were you able to do that, Aqua? Was it just a natural talent given to you or is it the doing of some kind of spell? I am not familiar if it's the latter.
I understand perfectly, Aqua! It's just like us elves! We may look slender and elegant, but our magic helps us pack a punch!
Mhm! Magic works like that, Aqua. It's why elves can punch above our weight!
Ugh... You know, my butt used to look just like that! Better, actually!

Psh! I could make my butt look like yours in no time!
...But I'd rather have my fries.
I wonder what it would feel like to slap it...
You should sell ads back there, Aqua! Everyone's looking anyway!
Not bad, Aqua. It's almost as cute as mine!
Sure, I could do a million squats to look like Aqua... or I could play video games!
What're ya tryna prove, Aqua? Huh!? You think that toned booty makes you better than me?
Psh! You get used to it when you're this gorgeous, Aqua.
Thanks, Aqua! I've been working out!
What a coincidence! I've traveled between worlds too! Were you also looking for fries?
Incredible! Tell me, Aqua, did you cross over into other worlds in search of fries like I did?
C-Careful with that, Aqua!
Whoa... So fancy!!!
Ugh... If only I'd done the same... My sweatpants might have survived!
Hey! If you wanna put on a show for us, I'm not complaining!
That's... a great idea, Aqua!

That's a neat trick, Aqua...
Do my stockings even fit anymore?
You know, Aqua, your outfit looks quite a bit like Elven hunting gear! Mine's... in storage right now...
I've got an outfit that looks a lot like yours, Aqua! I... haven't worn it in a while...
Say, Aqua! Is there a world you'd call your favorite?
Oooh! I can't wait to see what you've got planned next! Maybe try taking them off sloooowly?

Oh, nyo--it's nyot regional or anything, nya. It's just something I do for fun, ~aqua~-chan! Words get kinda boring when you make everything sound the same--it adds interest and cuteness when I speak, right?
Accyent? Nyo, that's nyot it--it's just something I do for fun, ~aqua~-chan! Words blend together when you speak in the same mannerism--it adds interest and cuteness if I speak like this!

Ah, I could go on and on about how good I am, ~aqua~-chan, but to spare you the details...
I'm widely knyown for my healing magic in my country--it's basically the reason I became a knyight like I am nyow.

Oh, well if you're asking... I'm pretty great at my healing magic, ~aqua~-chan--to spare the details, I'm widely knyown for my healing in the country--enough so that they recruited me into the royal knyights solely for that!
Yep! It's nyot too hard, but it's mostly the people who want to call me mean things for acting like this, especially since I'm a man. But I like doing it anyway, so I don't let them get to me, nya!

Mhm! It's nyot too difficult, but it's mostly the reaction that was hard to get used to--calling me rude things and judging me, especially since I'm a man. But I do it anyway, since it's fun and cute, nya!

{small}Eheh, you said knyights~{!reset}
Mhm! I'm sure where you're from has much stronger variants of healing, but I do fantastic for how young I am, nya~
Healing magic uses water mana, instead of a traditional light or general healing spell.

{small}Oh, you said knyights~{!reset}
Yup! I'm sure where you're from has stronger variants of regular healing, but I think I do fantastic for how young and inexperienced I am.
Healing magic uses water mana instead of something else, like light or a traditional healing spell.
Neat trick, but it's hardly a big deal. My dug can do th' same thing. He's always got a wee blade in his gob.
You would be correct, Aqua. It's a pleasure to meet you too!
I do! It's always a treat getting to perform for my adoring fans! Though, the best part about traveling around the world is all the wonderful places you get to visit, like Disneyland!
I do! It's always a treat getting to perform for my adoring fans! Though, the best part about traveling around the world is all the wonderful places you get to visit, like Disneyland!
It really is! It's something I'll always be thankful for, because without it, I wouldn't exist!
Oh wow! That's really cool! Do you use your Keyblade like a sword, because it seems like a really formidable weapon?
Aqua? Are you from Fontaine, perchance? Ah... lots of fountains, the Hydro element in abundance...?
I'm always interested to hear stories from people from other worlds. Do you have any that you've favored?
Most of the travelers I know cross worlds alone. Do you have any close friends...?
Ah... Another world? So you're a traveler, then?
Not close enough to play this game with though, ya?
You look quite sexy as it is, Aqua. The question I have is if you're having fun while you're doing it, ya?
You may not know this yet, but I'm quite partial to Pyro. Perhaps there's something steamy ahead for us working together~?
Given my affinity to Pyro... Perhaps there's something rather steamy we could work together on, ya~?
Or you could just have a sharp blade. What's the magic actually do? Oh, can you make a little bubble shield around yourself?
So cool! If there's more to the magic than it disappearing, I mean. Maybe it shoots lightning bolts?
Well, I'd tell you to put it in its sheath, but you're above that sort of thing.
It does look like you're about to attack us. This is why people invented sheaths.
So it's called "Rainfell"? Hmm, Jura should give her own sword a name...
"Rainfell" the Keyblade...it sounds cool, but soothing! My Dread has a name, but not my sword...
...I don't know, Meia, maybe we should give this girl a chance. She did sound pretty sincere.
...Haaaahn. What do you think, Meia? Benefit of the doubt? At worst, maybe she's just doing what she's told.

...Sorry, you said were a "Keyblade" Master? I don't see anything.
...Oh, but that's not a challenge, just so we're clear.
Did you bring this "Keyblade" with you? I don't see a sheath anywhere. A-and I don't want a duel, for the record...
So your Keyblade is a kind of magic sword. Or maybe more like a blunt object, and the magic does most of the damage. Am I right?
A magic sword...or a big magic key, anyway. Who cares what shape it is if the magic is doing all the work? That's it, right?
You're really pretty, by the way. And even taller than me! What are you really looking for here, huuuuh?
Heeey, we've got a lot in common, you know. Tall, beautiful, and a blade at our sides---sort of. So what exactly are you after---or who?
You're so serious. It's like your whole life revolves around training with that Keyblade. What do you do for fun, huh?

I can tell you're a good swordfighter, but there's more to life. Do you have any hobbies?
Or... other weapons, maybe?
Are you just gonna tease us about your mystical magical "Keyblade"? Once you've got my interest, you shouldn't waste it.
You really should've brought your fancy "Keyblade" if it's really so spectacular. Sheesh, I really wanna see it now!
You understand, right? It's hard to balance practicing with staying beautiful. And sometimes, one can ruin the other!
I have to brush my hair as much as I have to brush up my swordplay. And shower, and groom, and pilot...how do you manage?
So it's not beneath a Keyblade Warrior to debase herself for us? It doesn't make you unworthy?
What's exactly in your Keyblade Wielder Code, huh? You think they'd put something about public masturbation.
...Meia, you don't know what she's talking about, do you? It's a little creepy.

H-hey, you don't need to summon anything here. Or---anyone.
{small}...Meia, we should keep an eye on this girl.
...I don't know what that means. Is it maybe like---it's got a mind of its own, sort of? It only lets you control it?
...What is it, a person? Or---do you have some special connection to it, like it only listens to you?
H-hey, we know firsthand what passes for "darkness" according to Earthlings. Not to mention your "outside forces." Is Mejare part of those?
O-"outside forces"? Oh, no, I think we know exactly what you're talking about. Why don't you just leave our homeworld alone?
Strength of heart makes about as much sense as whatever's powering our Vandreads. I wonder if I could do it...
Oh? I have the strength of heart to pilot a powerful fused mech---and even make it fuse in the first place. Now I want to try Keyblades.
Maybe, maybe not. Your homeworld's been trying to kill us for the better part of a year, so when you start talking all high and mighty...
It's hard not to have any doubts after what this planet's sent after us...
A Vandread is also capable of more than it appears. Hoisting a brilliant blade at my side---I love that image! Where can I get one?
I want one. A fighter who shines like a brilliant star, piloting a craft with impossible power---her sidearm should be just as striking!
So you do have an ego. You came to play this game, after all---but showing your body just isn't enough.
Oh? So you're not just the prim and proper soldier. You want to dazzle us with a good show.
Maybe. But if she knows too much about emotions, she might be playing with ours...
It is encouraging. Or maybe she just knows how to feed off our emotions.
Ugh, you're being so difficult. I'm not just some civilian, you know!
H-hey, don't just bat me away like I'm some nobody! I'm good enough for the Paksis, but not for a Keyblade?
I-is---is that it? That's not a blade, that's---a key! How do you fight without it catching on stuff?

A-aah! Y-you can just---summon it?
...I'm not sure why you'd want to. Which side is the sharp one?
Don't get me wrong, I like the tenacity. A girl you can rely on is a really precious thing...
You mean you need friends? I figured you're all business...which has its own appeal.
Aaaahn, they must love knowing you're always there to protect them. So strong, so reliable...so in love!
And you'd protect them with your life, riiight? That's so romantic...I know what that kind of friendship can blossom into!
Don't be so coooy. Are we talking man---or woman?
So you're not comfortable? Come on, give us a little more detail---is that "side" the feminine side?
...OK, I didn't think someone would be worse off than me. What kind of training did they put you through?
Uhhn...so celibacy was part of your Keyblade training? Even I at least know how girls look.
"No time." Don't give me that, Aqua. You think I never train? You want something, you do it!
Hey, Aqua, if you really want something, you make time for it. Don't make excuses!
I'm not just anyone! Ugh, what're you looking down on me for? I at least deserve a real reason!
"J-just anyone?" And what makes you so much better? Jura demands an explanation!
Wha---don't make fun of me! I thought your magic spells were energy blasts, not---laundry detergent! I have to treat cuts and bruises!
M-magic? You don't get it at all. Iwish I could just lift my sword and soap myself!
So it's up to your own judgment what makes a good girl or not. A pure-hearted kind of perversion.
They must have trusted you to treat your body right. Go ahead and show us non-wielders what that looks like.
Hey, pretty sweet trick with that blade of yours! Wonder if I could do something similar...
Some interesting clothes here to~background.time~. Take Aqua for instance. I mean, I don't even know where to start with that.
Huh, that outfit is... hard to pin down. I'm not getting it. What are the influences here?
You know, if you're looking for training in social graces, you won't find a better teacher than Kaz Kaan.
If your purpose here is to get better with people, then you're in luck. I could quite easily be your guide.
As neat as your Keyblade is, if the goal is social interaction it would be best to remain unarmed. People tend to feel threatened by weaponry...
Not that your Keyblade isn't cool, but my advice would be that for the purposes of getting to know people we should keep all magic weaponry inside its pocket dimension.
It's hard to believe you don't have suitors lined up back home, Aqua. Even if you're a little shy, aren't there guys and ladies out there taken enough by the sight of you to approach you first?
And did you learn anything interesting from that?
And now that you've seen our reaction, what did you find out?
There's nothing wrong with just being goals-oriented. If you stay on the grind and surround yourself with like-minded individuals, that sort of spontaneous invitation is bound to happen sometime.
It's very "fantasy meets more fantasy." Does this all serve some sort of practical purpose, or is this just the style in... uh, someplace?
My expert analysis should be able to break down the core branding here, but this is beyond me. Could this really be "just the fashion" of some far-off world?
Everybody back home would never turn down a chance to learn from me. Why, I was even hired to teach about elegance at my esteemed alma mater... {small}sorta.{!reset}
My credentials are as followed: I am a gentleman of peerless elegance. I mean, what more do you need? I'm your guru!
Whoa, neat trick. It's like a key, but it's also a sword? Or is it like a club for, like, bashing people over the head with?
Oh, a "Keyblade?" Is it really sharp like a blade? It kind of looks like it's made out of plastic.
Hm, well, it's hard to say. You're so attractive it's hard to be perfectly objective about it, but there's just something about the style. It's just a little goofy...
Maybe it's just so different that it's rubbing me the wrong way. It doesn't help that you're so beautiful I can't really pick out what elements aren't working...
Well, if you're looking to get a rise out of us, there's a few other things you've got that we're interested in seeing...
Larger than usual novelty items are nice and all, but I think we're all interested in seeing a few other things from you.
Mhmm... opportunities... right in front of... me...
Both of you are named â€œAqua,â€ correct? My last name is Kirigiri, so you can tell ~kyouko_toshinou~ and I apart by that, but how should I differentiate you?
Youâ€™re both named â€œAqua,â€ correct? Thisâ€™ll get more confusing than itâ€™s worth if we donâ€™t come up with a way to tell you apart. Any recommendations, you two?
Itâ€™s been a long time since Iâ€™ve been what might consider a rookie. I was given the third-highest rank a detective like me can have in my home country six years ago.
Iâ€™ve been working as one for a while, actually.
I got my start working with my grandfather. Iâ€™ve been solving cases for almost as long as I can remember.
I got my start working with my grandfather. Iâ€™ve been solving cases for almost as long as I remember.
â€¦Fascinating. I hadnâ€™t thought that the name â€œAquaâ€ would preclude someone from wearing underwear, but here we are.
You know, I never expected that there would be some reason you canâ€™t be named Aqua and wear underwear, but it would seem the two of you know something I donâ€™t.
So you just have a weapon you can summon whenever you want? That's so cool!
Nope, just more of the same.
Oh, actually, I've been thinking about changing things up and writing an original manga for a change.
Yeah, there's a lot more to it than writing doujinshi, but I thought it'd be fun to start from scratch for a change.
You've gotta tell me more about this world-hopping thing you do, ~aqua_kh~!
The lanes... between? Between the worlds?
"Keyblade" sounds like a pretty funny looking weapon. You gotta show it to me sometime!
Well, if you're just trying to be sexy, you don't need to worry about a thing. You're doing a great job.
I didn't want to say anything, but I was wondering how you'd fight with a weapon like that. A magical enchantment makes sense.
That's a cool trick! I wonder if any of the mages from my world could do something similar?
Oh, do you store weapons in a magic space like my friend Erza?
That's a difficult question to answer, Aqua. I have a fondness for Demacia as I was born and lived there, but I cannot help but distance myself from it.
I've known about my power for years. I've had to keep it secret for just as long.
That's one way of putting it. Even so, I'm enjoying the chance to see and explore the world on my own terms!
That's one way to put it! Even so, I'm taking advantage of this chance to see the world. I can finally explore on my own terms!
It wasn't dangerous, but it would've brought shame to my family. At least now, I don't have to worry about that any more!
If there's one thing I'm known for, it's staying positive, no matter what! A setback is just an opportunity to shine even brighter.

You're right!
{small}I just wish I could've left home on better terms.
Aqua, are you able to use magic without your Keyblade? Or is the Keyblade doing all of the work?
You're slipping, Aqua! Aren't you supposed to be a Keyblade master?
So, Aqua... You have to fight these creatures of darkness, right?
Oh, come now. It was just a little bit of teasing. I don't doubt your skills. Even if I am doing a little better than you!
Oh, come now. It was just a little bit of teasing. I don't doubt your skills, especially since you've been ahead of me clothing-wise!
I see! So, it's just like my light, then. I don't need my wand to use it, but the wand certainly helps focus my power.
My magic would certainly be useful against these creatures, right? After all, the light repels the darkness!
I was never one for using blades, but a weapon like that sounds very useful! And personalized.
Ahaha... Maybe you're right.
I would certainly enjoy teaming up with you some time, Aqua. To fight the darkness, of course. Ahaha!
So that's what your `Keyblade' looks like... Haha! It looks like it's perfect for you.
I'm sorry, but I fail to see the difference between those things. Magic is magic.
It's not pretty fun. It's super fun! It can be proven with a demonstration!
I don't get what you're talking about, Aqua. Sleight of hand is channeling magical power.
I'm here to win -- for Team Magm-- What the hell is goin' on here?
Too much water? Join Team Magma, and we'll fix-- wait what the hell is goin' on here?
Oh you've gotta be kiddin' me.
Three of them? Really? You're kiddin'.
Three Aquas. Three. Not just an Aqua Grunt, no. Had to be three of 'em.
Did I mention I hate water? Three Aquas, for cryin' out loud...
{small}... Keyblade, more like Gayblade...{!reset}
Hey, Aqua, I have a question: do you happen to have any younger siblings? Maybe it's just me, but I get the feeling that you'd make for a great older sister.

Is that so... what is he like?
Most pairs of siblings I've met tend to be opposites, for some reason... so I'm guessing he's more outgoing and lively compared to you?
Oh, I just run a little farm raising cows and chicken and sheep. It does keep me busy, but I so enjoy the company of the animals.
What can I say? I can't help but help out when I see a poor, helpless little thing.
Oh, it's nothing special at all. I'm like anyone else: I just want to coddle helpless little creatures.
Though, some little things need a little sterner care than others...
Hm, it's a bit flashier than the sort of weapons I'm used to.
Hey, nice key item! I see I'm not the only with a satchel that can store way more stuff than you'd think.
Sooo... "Aqua", right? I'm hoping your parents were just a fan of water-types. They probably weren't pirates, I'm guessing.
...Have you been trying to study it? Leavings things to "magic" means they might never develop.
Our ship's fusion core has performed things that seem like "magic." I want to believe there's explanations...
...It sends the wrong message to have your weapon drawn.
...I could point my ring at you, to give you an idea.
Maybe if she shows us this top-secret weapon she has. The "Keyblade."
Showing your weapons is a good sign of trust. She's still keeping that "Keyblade" a secret.
I heard you're a trained fighter, but what exactly are you fighting? Are you part of some standing army?
...What's the purpose of your Keyblade training? I don't know much about this planet's politics.
...Can you say more about the special powers your weapon has? If it's so powerful, you'd think they'd be mass-produced.
I get the sense your job depends on the powers your "Keyblade" has. Why aren't there more of them?
I wonder if that blade's properties could be transferred to some kind of ranged weapon. The key itself could fire laser beams.
I'll always take a ranged weapon over a close-quarters one. You could have that blade studied---maybe converted into a rifle.
Your agility seems really impressive. I could learn a lot by training with you.
I hope I'd be able to keep up with you in a sparring session. You've got the size advantage, and you're more agile, too.
...You were keeping those things tight. You must have to, to stay so mobile.
Flipping around and striking has got to be even harder with breasts your size.
...Do you tend to strike out on your own? Even though you have comrades.
...Maybe it's the wrong impression, but I feel like you try to handle everything yourself.
Maybe whatever we're a part of goes beyond time and space, and into other universes. Maybe we'll see each other again.
Seeing new worlds, and traveling across time---maybe that's just the first step. There's you, visiting other dimensions.
..."World order"? Maintaining that means different things to different people.
...Things like "darkness" and "world order" are pretty vague.
Between worlds? Are you saying you're on some ruling force Earth uses for all its territories?
...I don't understand. So you're part of a peacekeeping force "between worlds"? Like, colony overseers?
...So this is the kind of language they use. As if we're the aggressors, just for existing.
It's hard to hear ourselves being described this way. But it's just like how we dehumanized Tarak.
...I'd heard Earth was pretty devastated, at least in my time. I don't know about all the "other" worlds.
..."Destruction"? Apparently Earth's environment is degrading. But the other colonies shouldn't be affected.
Who exactly have you been fighting? And---where?
Why don't you explain your "enemy" in more detail, as well? Where they live, and what they look like.
...That just sounds like some tradition. Do you know where it actually comes from?
...Have you witnessed that firsthand, or is it just what you've been told?
I thought our Dreads weren't capable of much improvement. Then with some new technology, they started circling planets.
It's still worth considering improvements. Our Dreads were already advanced, but now they've grown into planet-level weapons.
..."Negative emotion"? Maybe she's an ally, after all.
Negative emotions. If there's any red light in her "darkness," then maybe we have nothing to fear.
It doesn't sound like something they'd want you to dwell on.
I doubt they're eager to share it with others.
...You have to make yourself a small target.
Well, the first thing is to---cover your weak points.
How much experience do you have bare-handed? Maybe I'll close the gap that way.
That's hand-to-hand sparring, by the way. I hope you don't only train with your Keyblade.
In the meantime, you'll have to give me a show to remember.
Just in case, make sure this sticks with me.
...Then again, it's a big place. Maybe do a cartwheel so I won't forget you.
That's how I am. I've learned to appreciate them some more...now I'm trying that with strangers.

Me too. I used to resent any kind of help.
...I hope this marks a change.
If we can improve ourselves, we can improve our tools.
I'm no engineer. But sometimes it's just your mindset that needs to change.
...Sometimes I wish mine were bigger, but I know they'd just get in the way.
It's a good problem to have---depending on your attitude.
...I hate how jealous I get. I know they'd be a nuisance...
A Keyblade, you say? Well, it certainly looks impressive. Do they all look like that?
Daring to~background.time~, aren't you, Aqua? I think you look good with your socks still on.

{haiku}In youth, loneliness;
I sought succor in poems,
catharsis through words.
{!reset} It's not a particularly happy tale, but it made me who I am today.
It isn't particularly complex, but some of the training can be pretty rough... Learning how to heal, in particular, was exhausting.
Oh, but you don't need to worry. Recently, I find myself alongside more people that I know how to deal with; if anything, I crave the quiet now.
Given that I belong to an army, I am pretty much in constant demand... but I'd rather gain renown for my literary skills, instead.
Say, Aqua, you have traveled to many different worlds, haven't you? Which would you say is the most beautiful view you have ever seen?
Being so well-traveled, have you ever felt the urge to put your experiences into words, Aqua? Perhaps in the form of poetry?
Are you in such a rush that you cannot properly enjoy the views? Perhaps you should slow down, then...

Castles do have an imposing aura around them, don't they?
{haiku}Lone, still guardian
separating its allies
from its enemies.
Who is this Cinderella, to have made such a profound impression on you in so little time?
Well, it may look unconventional, but I have seen my share of nonsensical weapons: umbrellas, hoes... Once, I think I even saw someone wielding a giant daikon radish.
Do you? Well, I shall take your word for it.
Well, it is my goal... but thanks for the support.
Giving up so soon? You'll never know until you try.
The dungeon? Oh, I took you for a law-abiding citizen, but it seems appearances can be deceiving...
The way you describe this story, you seem charmed by it. Are you looking for a prince yourself, perhaps?
Ah, that's a shame. But maybe you can return with those friends of yours, reminisce a bit about the past... Could be nice.
Oh, sorry, I meant, like, the game's rules and procedures. I'm learning how to code, so I talk about things in those terms accidentally sometimes. Ahaha~
Oh, that's, uh, the website I used to learn how to play poker with. Strange name, huh? Ahaha~
Oh, thank you, ~aqua_kh~. And yes, ~player~, go on. Tell us all about how much you like it.
A magician can't reveal her secrets, ~aqua_kh~. It would ruin the fun! Ahaha~
So, ~aqua_kh~, was it? I hear that you travel between realities -- or worlds, I guess -- for work. How do you do that, exactly?
It's ~aqua_kh~, right? I was wondering -- I've heard that you've visited other worlds before. What do you do to do that?
Are you much of a reader, ~aqua_kh~? I'm president of our school's Literature Club, so I'm obliged to ask. Ahaha~
Do you read books a lot, ~aqua_kh~? I probably should ask, being Literature Club president and all.
Have you met any particularly interesting people during your travels, ~aqua_kh~? Other worlds must have memorable people.
While you've been in other worlds, have you met anyone who was particularlly memorable?
Ah, well, I suppose that it's just a product of my limited experience. I mean, I think your hair suits you quite well, ~aqua_kh~.
Of course I'm gonna win... I'm just throwing a round to make it more fair!
How am I projecting!? {quiet}Wait, what's projecting?{!reset}
Hehe~ I'm glad you noticed, ~aqua_kh~! My main sport is judo, but I help out with the swimming club sometimes too.
No, I'm not. I just know how perverts like ~player~ think. It's my special ability!
Exactly! A game is no fun if it's too one-sided, right?

Maybe it's because I always know how to...
surprise my opponents!
I guess you're right. There's just no saving ~player~. ~player.ifMale(His|Her)~ life is naturally unfair!
I'm not showing off for ~player~'s {bully}pervy{!reset} amusement! It's just funny seeing ~player~'s face get all red and stuff...
Appreciate me, ~player~!
For a hero, you're awfully timid, ~aqua_kh~. Are you nervous?
So what are you doing here, anyway, ~aqua_kh~? Don't you get enough excitement fighting evil, or whatever?
Would it help if you think of this as a battle of seduction?
So this is like your hobby, or something? Are you some kind of exhibitionist?
That's the spirit. Now, let's totally kick ~player~'s butt!
That's the spirit! And look, I think you've already "defeated" ~player~!
You two are both Aqua? I guess I'll have to come up with some fun nicknames...
You think so?
N-now you're definitely just trying to show off, ~aqua~!
Oh, so you're here to perv on other people, just like ~player~!
It does look pretty dangerous, yeah. Is the magic for a magic lock? I have a key for my house, but it's just normal-sized for a normal lock, so it fits in my change purse.
Whoa. It's... I don't know what it is, but it looks like a magical baseball bat in the shape of a sword key... thing.
Y-You're a very brave lady, Aqua. You looked danger right in the eye... and pulled your shorts down for it. I'm still a bit shocked.
Don't use a key as a weapon! What if it breaks, and then you can never get to whatever it opens... That would be a tragedy.
Big key must only mean one thing: big treasure! Am I right? Is it for a giant chest? A giant vault, perhaps?
I didn't know why my heart jumped when I first saw that giant key, but then it hit me... It must open a biiiiiiig lock! Perhaps with a very big treasure inside, heheh...
You seem to have the demeanor of a girl who doesn't know how beautiful she is. Did you maybe grow up around people that never acknowledge that?
There's something so cute about a girl as pretty as you who doesn't seem to be aware of it. Have the people around you never cared about your looks enough to let you know?
Woah... Big key.
Huh... That's the second biggest key I have ever seen.
It's inconvenient when two players have the same name, so... Aqua the water goddess, I'll give you a more fitting name ...Watery Heart! Now this sounds like a name of a deity.

Aqua! ...I mean the water goddess! You see yourself that it's a human name. I'll start calling you Watery Heart instead. That's how divine names sound in my world, so you'd better be grateful for the recognition.

It's not so easy to find anyone competent and reliable. I have my oracle Kei, but I can't make her work overtime... With her salary, it'd be very expensive! If you want something done properly, you have to do it yourself.

I don't know about any other kinds of goddesses, but I wake up early in the morning every day, exercise a bit, sign some documents, and fight monsters when I run out of paperwork. I need people to have faith in me!
These clothes are meant to evoke the image of a goddess, overseeing and protecting a country. Because that's what I do!
I'm a goddess, ruling over the country of Lastation, but these are my idol clothes! ...This didn't sound very convincing to you---or did it?

That entails a lot. I wake up early in the morning and try to strengthen people's faith in me. Some people want me to be active in daily politics, some want me to hunt monsters, and some to perform as an idol!

Sure, Aqua, with pleasure! It's the greatest country in all of Gamindustri. It's famous for its shops and robot factories, but there are beautiful parks and gardens you can stroll in too. Air is very clean nowadays!

Of course, Aqua, and you should visit it if you have a chance! It has the most advanced robot factories in all of Gamindustri, is a great place for shopping, and there is a lot of greenery too. Air pollution is at a low level!
You don't have to worry, Aqua---it isn't painful. But if you buy a pack of bandaids and want to do this, you should test them on a less delicate place first, of course...

Hey, now there's something I didn't expect! So was I just not paying attention, or did your sleeves transform into a huge-ass weapon? This little minx was keeping her angelhood a secret from all of us!

Fuck yeah! Bravo!
Heh. Who thought Aqua'd make me so fuckin' wet.
Do not be excusing yourself, Aqua. You are having great sexiness. You can be trusting me on this.
Aqua, you are not needing to make the excuses. You are having great sexiness. Please be having trust with me.
Aqua, this Keyblade of yours. How is one attaining one?
I am seeing. So, this is part of an order? You are having careful control of who is handing... er, getting their hands upon these.
Very well. I will not be pressing you more. I can have respect for you keeping this power in control.
Is the blade only enchanted to be sharper? Seems like a waste of magic, if that's the case. Why not spell it to shoot lasers instead? Or hearts! Hearts that shoot lasers!
Hmm? Is there something on my face, Aqua? You're staring at me rather hard.

Sort of, Aqua, The Queen of Hearts is just my magical girl title! I'm also known as The Magical Girl of Love, the True Avatar of Justice, O-01-04 in the facility for some reason... But my real name is Queen, or Queenie for short!

Of course I do! I have the power to cleanse the wickedness from all the hearts of the world, leaving them full of naught but love! Usually I have to whack or beam whoever I want to purify a few times, but peace requires action!

What do you mean? Obviously my heart is full of whatever this light is, I'm a hero after all! You're definitely seeing it wrong... Maybe there's still some monster blood stuck on me that's throwing your weird magic senses off...
Mhm! My magic just burns alllll the wickedness in a villain's heart away like a torch to oil! And after, they come out of my judgment with not a scratch on them!
How was I created, Aqua?... Umm... I dunno... As long as I can remember, my sisters and I were kinda always just there.

...Well, that's what happens most of the time. If a heart's too dark, parts around it tend to burn up alongside the evil... It's not a big problem, though! After all, with monsters that vile, there's usually nothing worth saving.
Nope! Just love and smiles~.
Hmm... Even without any dark splotches on your skin, you look a lot like my older sister Knight, Aqua, wearing all that blue! Maybe you fight evil like her and I as well?
Dark blue clothes and a huge sword to match... You look a ton like my sister Knight, Aqua! Well, aside from the weird black splotches on her skin... Hey, do you fight evil as well?

It's great, her and I do tons of fun stuff! Once we tried baking a cake, but... Ehe... I dumped in salt instead of sugar... Knight still tried to eat it to spare my feelings, but by the second slice she could barely move her arms...

Having an older sister is amazing! We fight evil, have long chats, cook fun foods... One time, a spider dropped on her arm while I was painting her nails, but she didn't flinch or move a bit till I was done!
So is it a key? A blade? Both? What kind of stuff does it unlock?
I'm sure it was forged in the blue flames a' Fantasia. Do a magic trick and make more clothes disappear, Keyhole.
So it's the magic that would hurt if I shoved it up your ass?
What kinda reverse psychology bullshit are you tryin' to pull, Keyhole? Twice over, since it's not even really a sword...!
Well, since ya brought it up, feel free to put it down. No one's givin' your ass another Monk Medal.
Well, we get the fuckin' point, Daffy. Wavin' that giant key around makes me think I'm on a blooper reel.
You're awfully polite for a blueberry. What, not gonna act proud and start shit like every other "master of the blade"?
"Blade" nuts usually have a sword shoved up their ass and coming out their mouths. They just can't fuckin' shut up, lookin' for a fight. So you got that goin' for ya.
Seriously, what's this shit the key to? I better not have walked into some chastity thing.
Every key has a lock. Are you like the samurai janitor, or is this whole shebang a cock-cage kinda deal?
Always with the magic and the fuckin' fireworks. You ever try putting a bullet in one a' Heart Attacks, or whatever?
I never met a "monster" that you couldn't slay with a pistol round in the right spot. You sure you're not wasting time with your magic song-and-dance?
'Least you got a fat set. Good way to get guys to go along with your Disneyland Drama. Am I wrong?
Tall drink a' water with a tall glass a' milk. That n' the stockings will have chumps linin' up around Disneytown. Or do they think you talk too much about hearts?
You goin' for the stocking striptease? Just as long as you don't start reciting the Legend of Lacey Lickspittle or whatever.
Hard to not take off your stockings all sexy-like. But I'm sure you could find a way. Like tellin' us they're Shadowbringers or some shit.
So am I one a' these "Heartless"? I've been called a lot worse than that since Tuesday.
If you told me you fought "Heartless" and then brought your key out, I woulda thought there's a hit on me. What's it take to get classified?
...You can't summon a stripper pole, can ya? You can glue on some crystal chunks to keep your mystique.
Don't tell me there's a Keydildo in your magic bag, too. Just as sacred, twice the fun.
I said, that's the M.O. of all the clowns running around Roanapur with scissors and knives. Maybe your Keyblade is the key to some brains.
I told ya, it's the sword. They all act like they're killing machines and not circus sideshows. Did they teach some kinda survival sense in the Keyblade School?
Oh yeah? How've your run-ins with them been? They want your goods, you show 'em the key to Hell?
But they're still crawlin' up your ass for a piece a' the action, I bet. Whaddaya do, give 'em a new keyhole?
What can I say? The key to my heart is usin' big-girl words.
Aw, fuck's sake. You gotta get out more, learn some vulgarity for yourself. It'd tickle my heart.
So it's a whole lotta extra effort when you could just put 'em down permanently. No one's givin' you a medal for takin' the high road.
...Am I supposed to clap for that? Might as well get the job done quicker and cleaner---and make it stick.
C'mon, bitch, you're bare-ass naked and you're still holdin' out on me? Call me whatever you want, or at least answer the question.
What the hell, bitch? I finally throw you a softball with your whole Kingdom-Farts bullshit and you just let it drop. Let loose if you really want to.
Oh, OK, I getcha. I learned from my stage work that everyone goes gaga for the gams.
Alright, signs a' life. I was always dressed in knee-high boots onstage, and lemme tell ya, when it was just the boots? Payday.
That's the spirit. Maybe we can be friends, after all---just let me a see a little more to be sure.
Heheheh! All that warmth was hiding a flame. Now show us your warm parts, and I think we'll get along just fine.
Well, at least you are not using it as an extra layer on top of messing with your luck, right?
Keyblade? Aren't those the spinny things that you throw and say something like "let it reek" or something? Maguro used to love those some years ago!
Don't just manifest stuff into existence that close to me! Specially if it's a weapon like that... thing...
You come to the strip poker game and reveal your long stiff thing just to see everyone's reactions? How original...
Oooh, a sword? I've made a few swords myself. They were all beam swords, of course.
Don't worry, Aqua! I think you look plenty sexy as-is!
You been to other worlds, yeah? I've only been to two. One's just a messed up version of the other.
Must be cool, seein' other worlds and all that. Only other one I've seen is like where I'm from. Just freaky.
...Y'know, some guys don't like a girl tougher than them. Not me, though. Love a lady that can take care of herself.
...It's kinda cool runnin' into a girl that can kick some ass here. Honestly, I love a lady that has some fight in her.
You can't be that amazed, Aqua, it's actually pretty easy! You just unhook it from the back, slip your arms outta the straps and you're done!
So what? I can summon my weapon out of thin air as well. You aren't as special as you think.
Who, me? I've mostly been dancing or visiting the arcade. Still love a good card game every now and then, though.
Ever since the gang and I came back from Egypt I've been focusing more on dancing. It also gives me a chance to visit the arcade with its dance game.
Oh, they're all over. Miku is even the mascot for some of them. I seem to do pretty well at those.
I don't mean to brag, but I once schooled a guy called Johnny Steps at that game, so I'd say pretty good.
Sure! The more the merrier, as they say.
I never would have imagined seeing a giant anime sword in real life.
Think of it as a kind of martial art. Although for me, it's more like... another sense? Since I was born blind, I've used it for things that I could not see.
Hey, magic doesn't exist! Unless we're counting Spirit World stuff, but that's more of Aang's vicinity... Hey, you aren't a spirit, are you?
"Radiant Garden," is it? I can't say the name is familiar to me. Was there a reason you thought it might be?
Hm, "Radiant Garden?" I'm afraid I know not the place, if only by name. Should I know of it?
I imagine you either mean 'tis a place full of stodgy scholastic types or Miqo'te. Or perhaps 'tis both?
Are these friends of yours Miqo'te too, then? Or perhaps you mean they are scholars? Some combination of the two?
Well, if that is the case I shall have to do my utmost not to give miqo'te a bad name.
If it is a place where inquiring minds might gather, perhaps I might benefit from finding my way there.

I realize this is hardly the venue for a drawn out conversation on the aspects of cross-world travel, but this is very much a subject of interest for me. Would you object to satisfying just a few of my curiosities?

I'd be remiss to trouble you overmuch, but the subject of cross-world travel is an interest of mine. Well, less an interest and more a quandary I must overcome. I know this isn't the best time, but I cannot help but ask just a few questions.
You strike me as one who is capable of defending herself, Aqua. Are you a seasoned adventurer or have you perhaps undergone formal training?
You have the unmistakable air of an adventurer about you, Aqua. No doubt you are no stranger to conflict. Tell me then, are you a student of the world or were you trained for your purpose?
So, this "Keyblade" you speak if is not something I am familiar with. I'm guessing it is some variety of specialized armament?
I'm not familiar with what a "Keyblade" is. My assumption would be that 'tis some variety of specialized sword. Do I have the right of it?
I see. I was formally trained in magic myself by Master Matoya from a young age. Spent the vast majority of my youth stuck in her cave.
I was a pupil myself once, entrusted to Master Matoya when I was but a child. Spent my days in her cave with naught but frogs for company.
I take it the shape is no accident. Mayhap it also serves as an actual key as well, serving to open or close something?
If I had to venture a guess, I'd wager the shape is a deliberate choice. In addition to being a weapon, does it serve to open or even close something?
Well, here is something I'm sure you'll be able to answer: how was it that you came to possess a Keyblade? From where or from who did it come from?
Hm, I suppose 'twould be best to begin with a question you must have the answer to: how is it you came into possession of a Keyblade in the first place?

It is safe to say the experience made me who I am today. I'm ever grateful I had the opportunity. Could have forgone the inhospitable environs and callous mentor, but one does one's best nevertheless.
Good and bad, but it shaped who I eventually became. The cave was not always comfortable and my mentor was even less frequently friendly, but I learned more in my youth than many learn in a lifetime.
Opening and closing the barriers between worlds? Well, I beg your forgiveness, but I'll need to know absolutely everything about this subject. I speak without hyperbole.

If it truly is a tool that can be used to open the way into new worlds, I'm going to need to know more. Much, much more. Perhaps 'tis best you just tell me everything there is to possibly know about it.
Passed from student to master, and then from them to the next student? Interesting, but where did the first master obtain theirs? Quite the mystery...
So it is inherited from whoever wielded it before? A common practice for arcane secrets, but it begs a question: who wielded it first and how?
You come from quite the different world, don't you, Aqua? Between your outfit and that artifact you carry, I can only imagine how strange it must be.
Such a strange item you have there, Aqua... I've never seen anyone with anything like it - or an outfit like yours. Typical things of your world?
So what brings you to the Inventory, Aqua? Curious about the gambling prospects it offers too?
Ahh, the potential of the Inventory truly is grand... Are you excited to be gambling here too, Aqua?

Ohh. That's a Keyblade.
Yeah, I get it now.
I would never leer at you if it wasn't a game like this... I will shamelessly stare at your ass, though.

You really don't have anything to hide, and I appreciate it a lot.
Thanks, Aqua.
Thanks for the wonderful view, Aqua.
Oh man, my eyes must be blurry, because I'm seeing three girls named Aqua with blue hair.
Oh man, my eyes must be blurry, because I'm seeing two girls named Aqua with blue hair.
